metadata.name: Pineapple #1
metadata.description: The Pineapple Housewarming Club is a collection of 300 pineapples launched in order to celebrate the opening of the Sygnum NFT marketplace. In line with the tradition of Sygnum to open new offices by rolling pineapples, this collection shall bring good luck and prosperity to the Sygnum NFT marketplace.
utilities: Access to the platform opening celebration in November 2022
Become part of an elite club of pineapple-holders
